News.Title: Goyal Salt Secures ₹78 Crore Order
News.Summary: Goyal Salt has secured an order worth ₹78 crore. The company's market capitalization is ₹340 crore.

News.Title: Goyal Salt Inaugurates New Salt Refinery in Gujarat
News.Summary: Goyal Salt has inaugurated a new salt refinery at Chirai Moti, Gujarat. The company aims to double its turnover to Rs. 300 crores within the next two years, indicating significant expansion plans and potential growth in production capacity.
